thread.title: Hillary Clinton Proposes Fee on Wall Street Firms’ Liabilities
thread.title_full: Hillary Clinton Proposes Fee on Wall Street Firms’ Liabilities - WSJ

author: Ryan Tracy
title: Hillary Clinton Proposes Fee on Wall Street Firms’ Liabilities
text:
Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton unveiled a series of Wall Street proposals Thursday, as she tries to fight off a populist primary challenge from competitors who advocate breaking apart big financial firms.
As a centerpiece of her plan, Mrs. Clinton proposed a fee on the liabilities of large financial firms to address risks she says they continue to pose to the economy. She also promised to empower regulators to...
